Scene11SpeakerDexa: ^Dexa: For the first time in a long time, I know my mum is going to be okay. And it’s thanks to you, Darwin.
^Darwin: I..uh..I’m glad I could help. Actually, I’m really glad I could help.
^Dexa: Perhaps you wouldn’t mind helping us Totten Town residents out once more?
^Choose to readily accept, nothing can stop you now!
^Choose to accept hesitantly, you’ve come a long way, but you’re still a young mouse who misses his family.
^Choose to respond snarkily, even though the residents of Totten Town are starting to grow on you.

c-0: ^Darwin: Of course! I wouldn’t want to miss another chance to practice my swordsmanship, afterall.
c-1: ^Darwin: Well…I..ss..suppose I did make it this far. So once more ww…wouldn’t hurt.
c-2: ^Darwin: You people really ought to look into hiring some help…but I guess since I’m here already I won’t say no.

Dovetail: ^Dexa: Just what I thought you’d say! Go to the wagon in the middle of town. There is an old cowboy named Ettie there that is awfully upset.
